using namespace std;
 
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define sc(n) scanf("%c",&n);
#define f(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define mod 1000000007
#define INF mod
 
typedef unsigned long long int ull;
typedef long long int ll;

ll a[200005];
ll dp[200005];

int main()
{
	int t,n,m;
	int i,j;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
		dp[i]=0;
	}
	for(i=0;i<n-1;i++){
		for(j=1;i+j<n;j*=2){
			ll pos=i+j;
			if(i==0)
				dp[pos]=abs(a[pos]-a[i]);
			else{
				if(dp[pos]!=0)
					dp[pos]=min(dp[pos],dp[i]+abs(a[pos]-a[i]));
				else
					dp[pos]=dp[i]+abs(a[pos]-a[i]);
			}
		}
	}
	cout<<dp[n-1]<<endl;
    return 0;
}
